title: 2013 Ford E-350 Super Duty 3/4 Ton
item_description:
2013 Ford E-350 Super Duty 3/4 Ton

  • License: 82952J1

Interior

Note: Certificate of Duplicate Title, Transfer Form, and Smog Certificate will be mailed 2-3 weeks after the removal. Pending new title from DMV. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV. Sale pending smog. Note updated 11/4/2024 at 9:45 am
